prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon with a crystalline appearance and a soft, fluffy body.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a small, gem-like creature with a gentle demeanor.
Imagine a Fairy-type Pokemon with a unique blend of blue and purple colors, featuring soft textures.
Generate a cute Pokemon that has a diamond-like structure and fluffy white accents.
Design a mystical Pokemon that embodies the essence of caves and mountains with sparkling features.
Give me a Pokemon that is small in size, with a heart shape and a shiny, textured surface.
Make a Pokemon that appears shy and gentle, adorned with soft colors and a unique gem.
